original_title: Si j'y suis... Épisode 1 : Pourquoi me persécutes-tu?
overview: In the meaning of Pascal, 'a war between Truth and Violence' or in the meaning of the Godspell, 'a division between a man and his father (...)'. And because the idea was to adapt Girard's "Achever Clausewitz", the Prussian General, author of 'Vom Kriege'. As far as the film itself is concerned, this means also war between sound and image...
title: Si j'y suis... Épisode 1 : Pourquoi me persécutes-tu?
